title: Overworld_Elder
body:
As you walk through the village square, you spot the elder sitting on a wooden bench, watching the passersby. When you approach, the elder's face lights up with a warm smile.

Elder: "Oh hello, traveller! I've been looking for you everywhere! It seems as if...

[[I could use your help with a small matter!|elder_request]]"

title: elder_request
body:
Elder: "I have a bit of trouble with that new gadget my grandson sent me. These newfangled devices confuse me, but you seem to know your way around them. Could you spare a moment to help?"

[[Agree to help the elder with their device.|Start_Elder]]
[[Politely decline, saying you're in a rush.|elder_decline]]

title: elder_decline
body:
Elder: "Ah, I understand, dear. You're busy, and time waits for no one! Perhaps later, when you're free."

You bid farewell, knowing the elder will be waiting patiently for help.

title: Overworld_Teacher
body:
You stroll through the school grounds, noticing Mr. Rhodes pacing nervously outside the computer lab. He waves excitedly as soon as he spots you.

Mr. Rhodes: "Oh hello, traveller! I've been looking for you everywhere! It seems as if... 

[[We have a bit of a tech emergency on our hands.|teacher_request]]"

title: teacher_request
body:
Ms. Rhodes: "The computer lab's main machine is acting up again, and you're the only one who seems to know how to handle it! Would you mind lending a hand before the class starts?"

[[Agree to help Ms. Rhodes troubleshoot.|teacher_accept]]
[[Decline, mentioning you have other pressing matters.|teacher_decline]]

title: teacher_decline
body:
Ms. Rhodes: "Ah, no worries! I know you've got your own adventures to handle. If you change your mind, I'll be here fighting with the tech until then."

You give a nod of understanding and continue on your way.

title: Start_Elder
body:
<<switch_elder_scene>>

You enter the elder's cozy living room, and they ask for help setting up a new device.

title: elder_setup_instructions
body:
Elder: "Thank you, dear. My eyes aren't as sharp as they used to be! My grandson says it's just a few simple steps to get this up and running."

[[Select language for the device.|step_1]]

title: step_1
body:
<<select_wifi>> 
You will have to use your mouse pointer for this activity. Select a Wi-Fi connection for the device.
 <<select_lang>>
Select a language for the device.
<<finish_screen>> 
Finished!

title: elder_end
body:
<<activity_end>> 
Elder: "Thank you so much! I can actually see what I'm doing now. You're a lifesaver!"

title: Start_Teacher
body:
You arrive at school and see Ms. Rhodes struggling with a computer in the lab.

[[Offer to help Ms. Rhodes.|teacher_request]]

title: workstation_assembly
body:
Teacher: Here is all the equipment we got in.
Ian: Cool. My partner will be showing you how to assemble the equipment
<<switch_scene>>
Here we go!

title: teacher_accept
body:
<<switch_teacher_scene>>

Mr. Rhodes: "Ah, thank you so much! Let's get started!"

title: you_already_did_me
body: Thanks for the help, traveller! You're amazing!

title: workstation_activity_start
body:
Drag and drop the equipment onto the desk to assemble the workstation.
Ian: Let's start with dragging the Tower Unit onto the table.
<<place_tower>> 
Ian: Good job. Now, drag the Monitor onto the table.
<<place_monitor>> 
Ian: Great. Now, drag the Keyboard and Mouse onto the table.
<<place_peripherals>>
